comment: Couldn't have had a more supportive teacher. Helped me out so much for the whole semester. bent over backwards to help me. recommend!!

Prof Morgan is incredibly helpful and supportive. The class has a lot of ALEKS work, but her video lectures and quick email responses make it manageable. Unstuck ai was a lifesaver for practice problems. Definitely recommend this class!
wonderful prof - very helpful-sticks to her policies and her testing rules, which some student's don't like. She doesn't like cheaters. But very fair and wants you to pass. Take!
Wants you to succeed and will help u if ur trying. makes good teaching videos. take

please take her!! her tests are super easy to study for with her study guides and lecture videos! she's just an amazing and caring professor overall. the homework definitely prepares you for the tests as well. her study guides are what will help you succeed so def do those a over and over for practice!

Unbelievably kind and supportive, she went out of her way to advocate for my academic success when she didn't even have to and was so incredibly compassionate and responsive when emailing. An actual gem of a teacher, cannot recommend enough.

100% I would retake this class!! I took it online and your assignments mostly consisted of your ALEKS homework, which sometimes was time-consuming. Her tests were lockdown browser and webcam, but she gave us study guides that helped me greatly (goes over the test).
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: fantastic!!!

Professor Morgan provided many video lectures that were helpful however the entire course is on ALEKS which can be frustrating to work with sometimes. She is very strict about her grading criteria and uses Lockdown Browser + Webcam and takes points off if you film incorrectly. She wasn't very compassionate/understanding and gives out A LOT of HW.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Prof Morgan is the best! She has plenty of additional videos that she creates and shares with the class on top of what is assigned in ALEKS. She responds quickly. Lots of work in ALEKS and most of your grade comes from the tests so it can be difficult if you aren't strong in math. If you are ever having difficulty it is easy to reach her via email.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Test heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: If you're deciding between professors debbie morgan is the one! she is so helpful and caring when it comes to her students. she wants you to pass!! She has these helpful videos on D2L that she does on her own time because she loves teaching. She also responds fairly quickly to emails.
good prof-makes amazing teaching videos-yes, test use LockDownBrowser, but ALL online courses do.cares and responds back quick! would take again!!!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I like Professor Morgan because she seems to really care about her students. She responds fast to my emails If you do the homework and study guide you are pretty much prepared for the test.  Also, I like her teaching videos. She makes the math much easier to understand for someone like me who does not like math and has never been good at math.

terrible. not helpful at all. her test lockdowns and requirements make it impossible to succeed. and aleks is the worst platform to learn on, which is what she assigns every test and assignment on. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS
She really went out of the way to show me concern when i had some physical issues and missed class. She cares about students and what they might be going through. good teacher

Professor Morgan was helpful, and understanding and answered questions promptly/honestly. She is straightforward and does not mess around with her guidelines, but she was accommodating to my personal needs from the beginning. She posts test reviews & wants to see you succeed.  She is great! Class is fast-paced so just don't get behind!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: So far, so good this semester. Lots of online work in ALEKS. amazing teaching videos she makes.answers questions real fast.Sticks to her policies, but helpful.

Very good professor, really cares about the students and seeing them succeed. Responded to emails and questions in a timely manner. You might have to put in some time to understand the material as with any class.  Follow the Syllabus and do the homework, passed the class with an A+.

I took this class online, and while it wasn't hard, you definitely have to put in the work to be successful. Professor Morgan is very helpful, answers emails rather quickly, and wants her students to succeed but you have to be willing to work hard. The entire course is on ALEKS with a good amount of assignments to complete. I recommend taking!
SO agree with the rating below this one. Couldnt have said it better!! cares about her students! and does a lot for them!

I don't know where to start. Professor Morgan is my favorite professor at KSU. She cares a lot for her students and wants them to pass. She is EXCELLENT at communication and gets back to you real quick! I would definitely recommend having her as your professor!
really wants us 2 b successful. helps all she can. but u have to do the work! answers questions and teaches good. take!

I really liked her video lectures. They were very helpful. Also, I liked the fact that the homework really prepared me for the tests.  She did not put any different kinds of problems on the tests that were not in the homework like some professors will do.  Not a hard class if you do the work and stay current with the work.
Course takes time! Prof tries to help and teaches online and sends reminders. answers emails fast! (other profs don't)

Morgan tries to make a online course as easy as possible. She answers questions, has her teaching videos (helpful!!) and answers your emails quick. KSU uses ALEKS and it's a lot of work with deadlines. takes time and work, but do-able. Put the time and effort into it and you will be fine. good teacher though
Prof cares and tries to help you pass. Makes great teaching videos. There is quite a bit of work in Alex. I would take her again
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Professor cares about you.Answers emails super quick and sends reminders. Makes awesome teaching videos. Do the study test guides! Tests are like the guides. course takes lots of time!

Professor good at explaining topics (helpful videos). All exams on ProctorU (terrible service), very heavy homework load every week. Exams every 3 weeks, lots of material to remember. Make sure you have plenty of time for this class! Study guide only open 2 days before exam. Could not review much due to finishing weekly homework.

What I like about this class is that if you do the homework and watch the videos and then study the study questions for the tests, you can do fine. The questions for the tests come from the study questions. It requires weekly work to stay up but it is not that hard of a class.
very helpful teacher

The work is challenging for real. have to put in Lots of time! all online algebra classes the same way. But prof is good, asnwers questions, makes things clear, answers emails super fast. math isn't easy for me anyhow. but teacher tries to make it as easy and passable as possible.

You get out of this class what you put in. Some test are on proctorU which is the most confusing browser ever. The other exams are on lockdown and you have to aim the camera at your workspace or you get 10 points off. Also don't expect her to give you an extension exams due to technical issues or even if an emergency comes up, she doesn't care.
course is thru ALEKS and up to you to do the work. prof helps and makes videos, and test study guides which help! always answers u back fast. test r proctored. lots of work, but do-able. take!

I am glad I took Prof Morgan. She is caring and helpful. responds quickly to my emails. is easy if you do the study guides for tests. questions for exams come directly from the studyguides. Also, her videos were very helpful, she is an awesome teacher. makes concepts easier to understand. Also she gave everyone 3pts on final. Help me a lot.

Miss. Morgans class is easy if you keep up with it. There aren't many professors that are timely to respond in an online class, but she is there to help. It's not "an easy A", but it can be if you just participate. She is organized on D2l, post helpful videos of her teaching, and is respected. On Aleks she provides study guides for test (do them).

can't believe the bad reviews! those are students who failed and blame the teacher! they wont blame themselves! she does everything to help! her teaching videos are great! yes testing is by proctoru half the time so theres no cheat. big deal. and if you say you r sick or something, she asks for proof of that, if u r honest,no problem. Take her!

Miss. Morgans class is easy if you keep up with it. There aren't many professors that are timely to respond in an online class, but she is there to help. It's not "an easy A", but it can be if you just participate. She is very reasonable I had an 89 and she bumped me to a 90 when I asked. She actullay cares, post videos before test, orgainized D2l.
Most work is done on ALEKS. up to you to do the work. teacher is there to help and does teaching videos which help. a lot of online work. she answers emails quick.

FOR ALL the ONLINE Algebra courses: They use ALEKS and all tests are proctored. So that's not unusual!!! Her course is like any other online one. she posts teaching videos. other courses don't even do that. Yes, she makes you take the test just right, so you won't cheat. Students who can't deal with it, uh this is college now! She's a good teacher!

Be prepared to teach yourself the entire semester. The whole class is through ALEKS which the website is very touchy. If you miss one question for homework prepare to do 5 extra questions. You have to fold your laptop at a 45° angle for every test so she can see your entire desk. Crazy specific rules for everything especially tests

All online classes in math are by ProctorU or LockDown browzer. So thats not a big deal. dont no why students complain about that. its normal. get use to it, freshman or high schoolers. Prof makes very helpful teaching videos. answers questions quick
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Makes you take the test on PROCTORU (super awkward, some proctors take over an hour to setup) or lockdown browser. On lockdown you have to show your entire desk the entire time which is hard on a laptop. Very specific with how she wants the tests done or you get points off and the work is very hard.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: The class is a lot of work, but everything is very clear. Prof is there to help, makes teaching videos, answers questions. But its up to you to do the work ,keep up with everything because its online She does send out lots of reminders about due dates and other dates. test are monitored just do the work and keep up with everything and u'll b fine
take her. she cares.

Teacher gave quick answers to emails, answered all my questions and was willing to help me alot. some don't like proctoru, but it's not bad, unless u plan on cheating. That won't work there. Id take her again for sure.

BEWARE she makes you take test on ProctorU having actual people watch you as you take your test. Put time and to study and TAKE THE PRACTICE TEST because the questions are similar to the real test. Dosnt really have good reponses to your questions.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class is a lot of work, but whut online class isnt? Morgan is a great teacher, her videos she made were awesome and helpful. better than the videos we had to watch on D2l. Shes there to help if you need help and repsonds quick to your questions. Id take her again.

The class is set up to be mostly on ALEKS-lots of homework and tests, etc. It is an online course-that is why. There r due dates like any online class. takes time and work, but just do it and u will be ok. Test r proctored. She is there to help and you can ask her anything. she makes good teaching videos too
cares and helps u- lots of work and time for this course online- not the best math student, but she tries to help u- would take her again

Prof. Morgan is a sweet person but there was no actual instruction in her online class. She relied heavily on the textbook and ALEKS and obsessed over proctored tests. You have to be prepared to put in a lot of work in teaching yourself if you want a good grade. She sent angry emails but she was good at responding to emails.
very helpful when you need help. good teacher online

shes honestly a good person but the class itself is hard. shes VERY specific about how you take your test. its lockdown and webcame recorded and if your camera isnt EXACTLY how she wants it, youll get points off your test. its so unnecessary. she answers her emails pretty fast and is nice but she isnt lenient at all.
take!

All tests online and recorded. have to show environment and desk. no big deal; a way to be monitored online. All math classes do that. Online, so its your responsibility to do the work. Prof responses and helps. can get a good grade if you do all the work
Bruh. Get ready to do a room tour before each test if you take online. Very fast in responding to emails but other than that, very hard taking a class with a prof that is as strict a Prof Morgan.

I took Prof Morgan for College Algebra 100% online. Math is my weakest subject so I expected to struggle but I surprisingly pulled an A! The course is not very interactive, it's all done through a third party. There are weekly HW assignments that aren't difficult but time consuming! It's also A LOT of teaching yourself but she is there to help!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: Really easy self-paced online class. I had a few problems but she was super nice and went out of her way to help me. Keep up with the homework and assessments and its an easy A for sure.

class was an easy a, lots of completion hw grades but it's all on a weekly schedule so kinda work at your own pace, mrs. morgan was also super helpful any time i had questions and always responded fast!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: helpful, cares if u pass, makes things easyier than most classes

Dont let the many good remarks from three years ago fool you. Do not take this professor online. Her guidelines are terrible and has unrealistic expectations. You will get dropped a whole letter grade. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS. She doesnt even teach and only cares if youre cheating. Even when youre not and shes not sure shell drop your grade.
always responds quick. Cares if u do well. Take!
very good online teacher. cares if u do well. always answers emails quick!!!! posts helpful notes and comments etc. glad i have her for online now.

Honestly the worst math teacher I have ever had. All she does is worry about cheating on test. I have taking this course online and she has gone the whole semester with out teacher a single thing. She just copies the videos from the text book. The notes that she claims to make she just steals from another math teacher. Take someone else.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Excellent math teacher! Take!

This was my first online course. It was a challenge but she made it the experience worthwhile. She responded to all emails very promptly and make sure all the material was understood. I would definitely recommend her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: first online course--She made it very easy. Always repsonded back quickly and wants u to succeed. very helpful. Great online professor!

I really enjoyed Professor Morgan's class. I  am not good at math but I did well in this class because she made the material interesting. Anytime I had a question she was quick to respond. If you show up and put forth the effort you will do great. I'm glad I took her class.
Wonderful instructor. Would definitely recommend!

Thanks to Debbie Morgan, I have a much deeper understanding of math concepts.  I took her for all 3 of my ECE math courses.  Everything she does in class is purposeful.  I am a much better math teacher because of her.  Mrs. Morgan had office hours for assistance and I any time I emailed her for homework assistance, she was quick to respond.

All my life I've hated math but she actually made it fun and not too hard. She made math as interesting as it can be anyways. She prepares you really well if you come to class and do the homework. Basically the problems on the tests are really close to what's in the homework. If she sees that you are trying she will do whatever she can to help you.

I really enjoyed Professor Morgan's class. It's actually really easy if you just show up most of the time and do the homework. I thought the attendance policy was pretty chill. I loved her fun personality and she made math interesting, who knew? lol. Take her if you can!

Ignore the one person that clearly keeps making the same posts about Professor Morgan.. most college professors require attendance, not a big deal, and in this class attendance is not even a big chunk of your grade (10 points), there are 4 tests and a final which is sufficient, just like about every other class... She's great and caring. Take her.
Awesome! Great Professor!
Really GOOD class and actually makes you work for your grade! Other classes, you just have to show up to get a "A"! I imagine lazy people don't do to well in her class! Lol..

Only gives four grades which are tests and a final. If you miss class you are screwed. I'm not the best at math and she does not help at all. Her teaching style is awful and she is sometimes rude to students. Do not take her class!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: everything very clear( lectures, grading policy, schedule, what to know for tests)-- grades fair and partial credit_- answers emails back quick-- helpful-- would definitaly take again!

Prof. Morgan is awesome!!! You do not have to be a great math student to learn and do good in her class. She teaches everything step by step & makes sure you're prepared for the tests. I wish she taught calc!! Take her!!
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Morgan is seriously the best math teacher I have ever had. She makes sure everyone understands the material before moving on and will answer any questions you have with eagerness. You get 2 free absences before a point (out of 10) is taken off, which is very fair. Her teaching style is very easy to follow and learn and she is so funny.

I have never been good at math but  I have made my best grades in math under professor Morgan. She gives homework  but she doesn't take it up and I found that has helped me "get" the math better.  Her test are not overly hard if you stay up with the work and come to class.  The final is right off the previous tests.  She is really good.
come to class, do the work, you'd pass-  makes math easy   glad I took morgan
Don't take.
Go to class and do all the homework as her tests are from the work she goes over in class.  Don't miss class or you will suffer.  Beware that she is an attendance taker!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: has a gift of teaching-very good
Too much homework and attendance is a grade.  So when you are sick during flu season or you are in a car accident, she doesn't care.  There are much better teachers in the math department.  Avoid.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Morgan is a good professor she reminds you have a grandma. Her class is based on 4 test and attendance. Homework is optional however if you don't practice on your own you won't pass. There is a cumulative final exam so beware. It is easy to get lost if you miss a day a class so always attend .

Professor Morgan is amazing! She is so caring and tries her best to make the material as simple as possible. There is a lot of homework but she doesn't pick it up or check it. She just assigns it so you can do better in her class. You are only graded on 4 tests, a final and attendance so you do need to put in effort but the material is easy.

I love Professor Morgan! She's tough but very fair and cares about her students. She'll do everything she can to help you. She has a great personality and loves what she does. One of my favorite profs here at KSU
prof teaches good, easy grade, NO pop quizzes at all-have to go to class for extra points-would take again
Amazing Professor! Really cares about her students!

I have always  had a fear of math. I took Dr. Morgan based upon the numerous comments on this site and based upon a friend who had Dr. Morgan for a ECE math class. Dr. Morgan is an outstanding teacher who makes math fairly easy for me to understand.  Also, you can tell that she loves what does.

It is SO very obvious that the following 6"awful" ratings are from ONE very mad student. look at the previous 11 years of Morgan's ratings. they are excellent!Don't pay no attention to the next 6 ratings.  absolute lies! That student probably failed on HER ----.  Morgan is an excellent teacher. take!
She is one of the hardest teachers for this class. No partial credit and very strict on attendance.
good teacher--cares if student's pass--explains things good--makes math bearable--take!

Pretty good teacher. Gives a good amount of homework but it's optional. She's very approachable if you have a question about something and gives good study guides before every test. Attendance was a part of the grade in my class, so attendance is mandatory. Would definitely recommend this professor for this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: You can tell that she loves to teach, and that she does care about her students, but she wants you to use her methods for the most part. The class can tend to feel really boring, and she has a strict no electronics policy. She is a nice old lady who sometimes messes up on her problems, and you can tell that she feels terrible about it!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: fantastic professor and human being. So nice and helpful. very clear on subjects when teaching. makes tests as easy as possible and she'll tell you that. will not touch a door handle directly.

Great teacher!! Very obvious she cares about her students&their grades. There's homework after every class, which is a lot -but it is OPTIONAL!! I'm not naturally good at math&only did homework after chapters that I wasn't confident on and still made a B+ in the course. Morgan provides study guides for every test and tells you dates of every grade.

Tests r very straight-forward. She prepares u for them and DOES explain why she counted off. She puts a lot into the course and sometimes (maybe 3 X) uses past students (not by name) as motivations for the class. VERY clear teaching, and professional. Something's wrong if a student does not pass!!!  Take her! She makes math easy

I love math and this class was very different for me. She was too confusing on tests and would take off for something that you wouldn't really know why and she never had a good explanation on why she did. Another than that she was a very sweet lady and seemed to care and talk a lot about past students.

Dr. Morgan is such a sweet lady. She is a great teacher. She really cares about her students. She will randomly check homework if it seems no one has done it. I would take her again, I recommend her to anyone struggling in math. You may not get an A, but you leave the class with a better understanding of math.

Mrs. Morgan is a great professor. She really cares about her students from day one. I would tell you now she does assign homework every night but it is for your own good because it would help you understand the lesson. Don't let the homework scare you away because there is just like 6 problems that should not take you long to do at night. Take Her!

I absolutely LOVE Mrs. Morgan. This is my second degree and I can easily say that this is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is extremely professional, teaches in a way that is super easy to follow, and just really cares about her students. Go to class, do the homework, ask questions and you will get an A for sure. TAKE HER!
great teacher

Great teacher!There is homework and attendance is mandatory but going to class will only help you YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO STUDY FOR TEST IF YOU GO TO CLASS AND DO HOMEWORK IT IS STRAIGHT FROM CLASS AND HOMEWORK! Take her I hate math and I enjoy this class.
Very Helpful and really cares that one learns to be a professional and also learn the material.

One of the best teachers I've ever taken at KSU. She is so helpful. There are four tests and one big project at the end and she rarely takes homework grades. Attendance is required, but some absences are excusable if you email her. I came out of the class with a 98. Seriously, TAKE HER!!! SO sweet!

The best teacher I have ever had at KSU. Go to every class and take notes. Do the homework, it helps a lot when it comes test time. 3 tests, final, team teaching (teach class for 22 minutes with a partner) and teaching idea. So easy! Sweetest teacher!

Mrs. Morgan is an excellent teacher! She is very helpful and grades fairly. She offers one project where you can be the teacher for 20 mins. She had homework every night but it is easy and quick. She doesn't check it, but she will call on you for answers. Attendance is mandatory. The book was used only for HW. Tests are straightforward. Take her if you have the chance!
Attendance and homework is mandatory every class. Only one opportunity to practice teaching geometry. Tests are easy and I enjoyed the projects.

Dr. Morgan is a wonderful teacher! she has a love for what and who she teaches that makes the class enjoyable. she will not move on until you understand what she is teaching. HW everyday that isnt graded but it helps if you do it! grades very fairly. easy a. very happy i got to take dr. morgan!

Prof Morgan is a really great math teacher. The class is really easy and u could honestly get an A without trying. She give homework every day but doesnt grade it. She does take attendance and you only get two absences. But TAKE HER! ;)

I loved Mrs. Morgan!  She is such a good teacher and I was never bored in her class.  She makes everything very clear. She spends plenty time on each subject so that you will understand it before you leave class.  You do have homework almost every day but it does not take long and if you do the homework you will do good on the tests. Take her!!!!

You do a LOT of homework & get no credit for it.  So BE PREPARED for homework after every class.  She calls on u to c who completed their homework after every assignment! Attendance is MANDATORY.  Final can make or brake u grade &req'd by everyone!  Ended up with an A but I had to work VERY hard for it!

Come to class, do your HW, and review for the tests and you'll be fine. She's a great teacher and goes pretty slow explaining to make sure everyone gets it. The HW and study guides prepare you for the tests, answer each problem to the fullest because she's pretty picky on grading. Her methods are wonderful, I'd reccomend taking her!

THIS WOMEN CHANGED MY LIFE!!!!!  i hated math until i met Mrs Morgan.  She makes me excited to go to class everyday.  This women is exactly the kind of teacher i would hope to be someday.  She wants you to work hard but its because she knows that you can to do it! i would highly reccomend her to anyone! and she does dress really cute :)
good teacher!!-makes you work-you'll learn a lot!-she cares if you learn or not-review sheets-can explain math very good!!-dresses cute!don't take if you're lazy

Let me put this as simply as I can: This woman is the best math professor since Pythagoras. I am not a student of mathematics by any means, but she made me want to come to class everyday. She'll help you help yourself. If you aren't a lazy yutz and you do your work, you'll come out having learned something really valuable.

This is my favorite math prof at KSU! She teaches so everyone can understand and she cares. I had her for all 3 math courses and am so glad. I now can teach math and am excited about it!She prepares you for the tests.People who complain don't want to work.The work is well worth it! She's the best!Wish I could have her more.I'll miss her!!

I would highly recommend Mrs. Morgan she is a very approachable professor. She will help you learn the material all you have to do is ask questions in class and do the homework. She is a very harsh grader...make sure you do know the material inside and out or you will lose a ton of points on your test!

Her lectures are good. She doesn't go too fast. She gives time for quest. She goes over the h.w. and the tests. She is approachable and seems to care about students doing well. Her tests however are brutal. She grades really harshly. Little mistakes will cost you a lot of pts. I would still recommend her. Do your h.w., and study your tests!!
